name: Spirit Night
description:
Every year, on SPIRIT NIGHT, the spirits go out to help the locals and collect treats. How many people can you help? How many pieces of candy can you collect?? How spooky will it truly get??? There are many people in Rootsberg in need of help and who knows, maybe you'll even make a friend along the way...

The game takes around 30 minutes to fully complete but can be played faster if desired. There are 2 endings, depending on how many pieces of candy you collect!

Content warning: a few flashing lights but can be disabled (see ReadMe.txt).

Features
  • Pumpkins!
  • Trick or treating!
  • A spooky space maze!
  • A talking hat!
  • Illegal potions!
  • Spooky forests!!
  • A demon summoning??
  • And more cute and spooky stuff!
Credits

Art, story, music - Kyanite Heart

Testing - Waffleflower and Blue Dahlia

Thanks to my lovely partner for helping me out when I forget how to code!

I hope you enjoy this cute and spooky little adventure <3
